titleStmt.title: A New-Years-gift for the anti-prerogative-men, or, A lawyers opinion, in defence of His Majesties power-royal, of granting pardons as he pleases wherein is more particularly discussed the validity of the E. of D's pardon, by way of a letter to a friend.
titleStmt.author: Brydall, John, b. 1635?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H.H. for John Fish ...,

notesStmt.note: E. of D.: an abbreviation of Earl of Danby (i.e. Thomas Osborne, 1st Duke of Leeds).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
